title: OPEN UNIVERSITY BUSINESS EDUCATION
main_text_1: Open University of Business Education is a training and consulting center,whose activities are aimed at obtaining non-formal education.
main_text_2: Mission - building a modern multilevel system of continuing education by developing the interaction of the University with society.
main_text_3: Open University of Business Education actively cooperates with international organizations and foreign higher education institutions, including: DLI-Company (Germany), Kingsbrook idiomas (Spain), Jacksonville City Hall (USA, Florida).
author: Winston Churchill
parent_school_text: Hormonal, physiological, psychological changes during pregnancy, nutrition of the pregnant woman, intrauterine allergy of the kid, a bookmark of deciduous teeth, strategies of overcoming family crises, all about childbirth, breastfeeding, psychology of the newborn
